oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphis Novelty Works sword
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Memphis Novelty Works sword made by Leech and Rigdon. It is a field officer's foot sword. The sword belonged to Capt. Beverly Allen Fitzgerald from the 22nd Tenn. Inf. Bn., CSA. It is engraved with his name and where he is from. At the time of the war, he lived in Adamsville, Tennessee.
